casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Brandon MALONE 379A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2018 Paul M. Green, Assistant Appellant Defender, James Ryan Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Malone, Brandon. Jess D. Mekeel, Assistant Attorney General, Patrick Nadolski, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 1st of May 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 6th day of June 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
